title: Top 100 (best songs of 2019)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Mixtapes | Top 100 (best songs of 2019)
seoDescription: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2019. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2019. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.

title: Top 100 (best songs of 2022)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Mixtapes | Top 100 (best songs of 2022)
seoDescription: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2022. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A massive 6½-hour mixtape with 100 great songs out in 2022. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.

title: MixMag 2010-2019
seoDescription: A look from the 2020's pandemic to the past 10 years. 20 of the best techno tracks of the decade, selected by MixMag & mixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A time machine, a look from the 2020's pandemic to the past 10 years. 20 of the best techno tracks of the decade, selected by MixMag & mixed by Spineless Laugh in strict chronological order.

title: Sweet Ignorance
seoDescription: The sweet bliss of ignorance: an electronic mixtape about drugs, cookies, and the healing taste of what is better not to know.
excerpt: Emotional blindness as a blessing and the sweet bliss of ignorance: an electronic mixtape about drugs, cookies and the healing taste of what is better not to know. Don't ask yourself why they picked you. They didn't. You did.

title: Comedowns
seoDescription: Spineless Laugh's debut EP, merged in a single mix. A strange kind of electronic: asynchronous and obsessive, mechanical, and almost industrial.
excerpt: Spineless Laugh's debut EP, merged in a single mix. A strange kind of electronic: asynchronous and obsessive, mechanical, and almost industrial. The perfect soundtrack for your sweetest nightmares, a unique sonic adventure subdivided into six sad stories.

title: Exxence
seoDescription: The original compilation selected by Filigran Records honcho and A&R Adnan Duric, smoothly mixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A collaboration between Spineless Media and Filigran Records. The original compilation selected by the label honcho and A&R Adnan Duric, smoothly mixed by Spineless Laugh and ready for your old-skool parties.

title: The Last Big Impezzo (white rain remix)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Remixes | The Last Big Impezzo (white rain remix)
seoDescription: The Last Big Impezzo, originally recorded by Port-Royal, remixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A deep dive from original chaos to unfaithful calm and sharp melodies. Everything following a quite long path of noisy but tight kickdrum danceability.

title: Bad Aesthetics
seoDescription: A hot cup full of dubstep, lust, and uncontrolled electronics driven off road by kicking and overwhelming emotions.
excerpt: A hot cup full of dubstep, lust, and uncontrolled electronics driven off road by kicking and overwhelming emotions. A digital, detailed analysis of how shouldn't be so hard to have a nice day, and how actually is. Finally.

title: The Sun (numbers remix)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Remixes | The Sun (numbers remix)
seoDescription: The Sun, originally recorded by Big Charlie, remixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: You and me. The sun and an overwhelming rage looming. House beats, funky synths, 8-bit computer noises. Fractured voices, decomposed to be re-combined along multiple layers. Rising, then falling. Like the sun broken into cold numbers.

title: Time For Shopping (special offer rmx)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Remixes | Time For Shopping (special offer rmx)
seoDescription: Time For Shopping, originally recorded by DID, remixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: The trade of relationships. Buy and selling feelings. 8 bit ecommerce love before Amazon, swooshy swipes before Tinder. The club is closing, the night is still young, and emotions for sale. I have the time for you now, but it's not quality time.

title: Nude (postfabric remix)
seoDescription: Nude, originally recorded by Radiohead, remixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: Don't get any big ideas: they're gonna glitch into disjointed arpeggios. Beauty sampled asynchronously, but there's something missing, something's off the rails. If we all have to go to hell, let's make sure our minds think dirty.

title: Reckoner (d-stance remix)
seoDescription: Reckoner, originally recorded by Radiohead, remixed by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: Like ripples on a blank shore, synthetic tears separate into echoes of electric pianos and drum machines. No one's to blame. Melodic guitar samples are bittersweet distractors that fill some final gaps. Dedicated to all human beings, and robots too.

title: US2Know
seoDescription: A trancestep dubtempo filled with tremolo synths, numbed beats, and pieces of words repeated as a ping-pong delayed mantra.
excerpt: Have you ever had the experience of losing reference points through blurred memories of what you used to know? A trancestep dubtempo filled with tremolo synths, numbed beats, and pieces of word repeated as a ping-pong delayed mantra.

title: Geisha (a seaside tragedy in slow motion)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Music | Geisha (a seaside tragedy in slow motion)
seoDescription: An electronic triptych about beauty, slavery, misconception, and every other demon a relationship between humans can summon.
excerpt: Yet another electronic triptych. It's about beauty, slavery, misconception, and every other demon a relationship between humans can summon. Three parts, seamlessly blended, to match apprentice Geishas stages of training.

title: Emotional Chrysalis (a cinematic trilogy)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Music | Emotional Chrysalis (a cinematic trilogy)
seoDescription: An electronic opera in three parts, aiming to track down the ancient algorithm of building beauty from scratch.
excerpt: An electronic opera in three parts, aiming to track down the ancient algorithm of building beauty from scratch. First, casting caterpillar. Then, editing chrysalis and contemplating the J-formation process. Last, mixing the final butterfly in motion.

title: Top 90 (best songs of 2021)
seoTitle: Spineless Laugh's Mixtapes | Top 90 (best songs of 2021)
seoDescription: A massive nearly-6-hour mixtape with 90 great songs out in 2021. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh.
excerpt: A massive nearly-6-hour mixtape with 90 great songs out in 2021. A senseless, sketchy, and imperfect unordered selection by Spineless Laugh that surprisingly set up to be the hugest Best Of playlist of the year.
